lexUnit.name: inventor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: one who creates a new and useful device or process

sentence.text: The inventor of the submersible , Chris Nicholson , says the machine is capable now of reaching 600 metres .
Stein is often said to have been the inventor of the escapement for the German action .
Ald. McNaughtan laying the first rail , watched by Michael Holroyd-Smith -- the inventor -- standing by the platform .
The New Scientist magazine reports that an inventor from California , Patrick Kane , has created the world 's first dissolving golf ball .
An ingenious inventor in his own right , Hermes was an alchemist by trade .
In 1957 a British inventor called Cyril Walter Kenward had filed a patent on an industrial robot that both Unimation and AMf had infringed .
Gavin Dalzell of Lesmahagow copied his machine in 1846 and passed on the details to so many people that for more than fifty years he was generally regarded as the inventor of the bicycle .
Inventor Mike Godwin has created Cozydry -- the ultimate luxury in bathroom aids .
The inventor , Bart Zoltan , says the device could be made in bulk for under $4 -- a good deal cheaper than treating an overdose .
Luckily for Ruggles it was filed well before the US Patent Office began to ask inventors to pay renewal fees .
At the centre of the controversy was Professor Stephen Salter , now Professor of Engineering Design at Edinburgh University , and the inventor of one of the most promising wave power systems .
The inventor says that a steel flywheel around half a metre in diameter ran store the equivalent of around 5 kilowatt hours of energy .
Three hearty hurrahs , therefore , for the inventors of the GuitaRest , the kind of ultra-neat idea that keeps you awake at night wishing that you 'd thought of it .
Alexander Bain , the inventor , devised a way of skimming raised metallic letters with a stylus attached to a pendulum .
The person that this parent approached for advice was Alexander Graham Bell , the inventor of the telephone .
Kitson was a prolific inventor whose own difficulties in financing and manufacturing his patents had led him to a radical critique of the banking system .
An introduction by Heims outlines Wiener 's own experience as inventor of noise filters , an analogue computer and an electrical network concept .
Junk bond inventor and former jailbird Michael Milken is reportedly getting together with singer Michael Jackson to create an interactive television education network .
He was the inventor of the first reliable light steel umbrella frame , and early in his business life purchased the Cliffe estate from Sir William Worsley .

Benjamin Franklin , the official US representative in France , talented inventor as well as an effective diplomatist , considered that Lafayette himself should be in nominal command , with John Paul Jones leading the actual assault .

Exposed after a bigamous marriage in New York in 1885 , he changed his name to its final form and enlisted with Thorsten Nordenfelt , the London-based Swedish inventor of a quick-firing gun and an unseaworthy submarine .
